verses.verse: Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> The gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> that looks <S%H6437><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%> shall be shut <S%H5462><s%> the six <S%H8337><s%> working <S%H4639><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> but on the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day it shall be opened, <S%H6605><s%> and on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%> it shall be opened. <S%H6605><s%>

The prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> outside, <S%H2351><s%> and shall stand <S%H5975><s%> by the post <S%H4201><s%> of the gate; <S%H8179><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> his burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> and he shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the gate: <S%H8179><s%> then he shall go forth; <S%H3318><s%> but the gate <S%H8179><s%> shall not be shut <S%H5462><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of that gate <S%H8179><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> on the Sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> and on the new moons. <S%H2320><s%>

The burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> that the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall be on the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

and the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be an ephah <S%H374><s%> for the ram, <S%H352><s%> and the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as he is able <S%H3027><s%> to give, <S%H4991><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

On the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%> it shall be a young <S%H1121><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> lambs, <S%H3532><s%> and a ram; <S%H352><s%> they shall be without blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

and he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> an ephah <S%H374><s%> for the bull, <S%H6499><s%> and an ephah <S%H374><s%> for the ram, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> according as he <S%H3027><s%> is able, <S%H5381><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

When the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter, <S%H935><s%> he shall go <S%H935><s%> in by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by its way. <S%H1870><s%>

But when the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the appointed feasts, <S%H4150><s%> he who enters <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate; <S%H8179><s%> and he who enters <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate: <S%H8179><s%> he shall not return <S%H7725><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> by which he came in, <S%H935><s%> but shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> straight before him. <S%H5226><s%>
The <S%H8432><s%> prince, <S%H5387><s%> when they go in, <S%H935><s%> shall go in <S%H935><s%> with of them; <S%H3318><s%> and when they go out, he shall go out. <S%H3318><s%>

In the feasts <S%H2282><s%> and in the solemnities <S%H4150><s%> the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a bull, <S%H6499><s%> and an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a ram, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as he is able <S%H3027><s%> to give, <S%H4991><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

When the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a freewill <S%H5071><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> as a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> one shall open <S%H6605><s%> for him the gate <S%H8179><s%> that looks <S%H6437><s%> toward the east; <S%H6921><s%> and he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> his burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> as he does on the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> then he shall go forth; <S%H3318><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> his going forth <S%H3318><s%> one shall shut <S%H5462><s%> the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

You shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a lamb <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> daily: <S%H3117><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall prepare it. <S%H6213><s%>

You shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a meal offering <S%H4503><s%> with it morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning, <S%H1242><s%> the sixth part <S%H8345><s%> of an ephah, <S%H374><s%> and the third part <S%H7992><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> to moisten the fine flour; <S%H5560><s%> a meal offering <S%H4503><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> ordinance. <S%H2708><s%>

Thus shall they prepare <S%H6213><s%> the lamb, <S%H3532><s%> and the meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the oil, <S%H8081><s%> morning by morning, <S%H1242><s%> for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> If the prince <S%H5387><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> to any <S%H376><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> it is his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> it shall belong to his sons; <S%H1121><s%> it is their possession <S%H272><s%> by inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

But if he give <S%H5414><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> it shall be his to the year <S%H8141><s%> of liberty; <S%H1865><s%> then it shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the prince; <S%H5387><s%> but as for his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> it shall be for his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

Moreover the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall not take <S%H3947><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>'s inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> to <S%H3238><s%> thrust <S%H3238><s%> them out of their possession; <S%H272><s%> he shall give inheritance <S%H5157><s%> to his sons <S%H1121><s%> out of his own possession, <S%H272><s%> that my people <S%H5971><s%> not be scattered <S%H6327><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> from his possession. <S%H272><s%>

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me through the entry, <S%H3996><s%> which was at the side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> into the holy <S%H6944><s%> rooms <S%H3957><s%> for the priests, <S%H3548><s%> which looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the north: <S%H6828><s%> and behold, <S%H4725><s%> there was a place on the hinder part <S%H3411><s%> westward. <S%H3220><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H4725><s%> This is the place where the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> the trespass offering <S%H817><s%> and the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and where they shall bake <S%H644><s%> the meal offering; <S%H4503><s%> that they not bring <S%H3318><s%> them forth into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Then he brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> and caused me to pass by <S%H5674><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court; <S%H2691><s%> and behold, <S%H4740><s%> in every corner <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> there was a court. <S%H2691><s%>

In the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> there were courts <S%H2691><s%> enclosed, <S%H7000><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> cubits long <S%H753><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> broad: <S%H7341><s%> these four <S%H702><s%> in the corners <S%H7106><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> measure. <S%H4060><s%>

There was a wall <S%H2905><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> in them, <S%H5439><s%> around the four, <S%H702><s%> and boiling places <S%H4018><s%> were made <S%H6213><s%> under the walls <S%H2918><s%> all around. <S%H5439><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1310><s%> These are the boiling houses, <S%H1004><s%> where the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>
